product_name: LolaVieTravel Size Peptide Plumping Volume Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganLolaVie Peptide Plumping Volume Spray is a weightless volumizing spray that delivers 2x fuller volume with long-lasting lift for up to 2 days â€” without the crunch, stiffness, or build-up.
details: DetailsBenefitsGravity-defying volume: from root to tip with clinically proven bond tech for healthier-looking hairAll-day bounce: innovative frothy spray that keeps hair full and lifted from morning to nightSilky, hydrating formula: leaves no mess, instead just touchably soft textureDamage-free styling: protects hair from heat styling up to 450Â°F48 hours of long-lasting volume**when used on damp hair before blow-dryingKey IngredientsPea Peptides: Plump and thicken each hair strand without any heaviness or build-upB-Pro3â„¢ Bond Technology: Derived from chia seeds and clinically proven to prevent, protect and repair the look of hair aging and damageJackfruit: And orange pulpâ€™s cellular conditioners deliver silky, hydrating perfection minus the stiffness and crunchBamboo Extract: Creates a thermal shield, protecting hair up to 450Â°FFormulated WithoutSiliconesSulfates (SLS/SLES)ParabensPhthalatesGlutenItem 2637930How To UseSpray onto damp or dry hair, focusing on the roots for targeted lift or throughout for overall volume and fullness. Style as desired and blow dry with heat to activate, using a round brush for added body and bounce. STYLIST PRO TIP: To refresh bangs, spritz at the roots of your bangs for an instant lift and touchable, natural movement. Don't skip the heat!IngredientsLactobacillus/Arundinaria Gigantea Ferment Filtrate, Alcohol Denat., Lactobacillus Ferment, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Peptide, Salvia Hispanica (Chia) Seed Extract, Phyllostachys Bambusoides Extract, Bambusa Vulgaris Shoot Extract, Lactobacillus, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Water/Aqua/Eau, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Artocarpus Heterophyllus Fruit Extract, VP/VA Copolymer, Polyglyceryl-3 Caprate/Caprylate/Succinate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Saccharomyces/Zinc Ferment, Saccharomyces/Copper Ferment, Saccharomyces/Magnesium Ferment, Saccharomyces/Iron Ferment, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Hexapeptide-11, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Chlorphenesin, Polyglyceryl-10 Isostearate, Propylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Betaine, Linalool, Limonene, Citrus Limon Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia Peel Oil, Juniperus Virginiana Oil, Linalyl Acetate, Pinene, Santalol, Citral, Vanillin *Naturally-Derived FragranceShipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Spray onto damp or dry hair, focusing on the roots for targeted lift or throughout for overall volume and fullness. Style as desired and blow dry with heat to activate, using a round brush for added body and bounce. STYLIST PRO TIP: To refresh bangs, spritz at the roots of your bangs for an instant lift and touchable, natural movement. Don't skip the heat!

reviews.headline: Very good!
reviews.comments: Lolavie peptide plumping spray gives my hair volume without feeling heavy or sticky. The volume stays for several days. I really like this spray and will repurchase.

reviews.headline: I really do like this one.
reviews.comments: I really do like this one.  It's the best body booster I've used to date without being heavy or sticky feeling on my hair.  A bit expensive, but I'll continue to use it because it works.

reviews.headline: It worked for me
reviews.comments: I have wasted money on products that claim to add volume, but didn't.  This product worked well on my fine, thinning hair.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: Product sprays on to wet and gets watery droplets everywhere. Doesn't really plump up the hair well at all. Way too expensive to be this disappointed. I'm cutting my losses on this one and will not be buying further Lolavie products or recommending them.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: Made my too soft to hold a curl. Very little added volume. Really would not recommend.

reviews.headline: Didn't think it was worth it
reviews.comments: I bought a travel size, just to try.  Can't tell that it did anything so wasn't even worth the money for the travel size.

reviews.headline: Yes, love this product
reviews.comments: This product does what it says it can.

reviews.headline: Volume
reviews.comments: This product gives volume without being crunchy. It leaves my hair looking and feeling soft, health, and bouncy until I wash it again. I didnt expect 80's hairsprayed volume from it, but touchable volume, so maybe thats why im happy with it while others aren't.

reviews.headline: Overrated
reviews.comments: I normally don't write comments or review but this was a waste of money absolutely 100% I think the one I was getting at the H-E-B grocery store works so much better and it was half the price. I'm glad I tried it now I know no big deal ðŸ‘Œ

reviews.headline: Maybe it would be suitable for shorter hair
reviews.comments: Wanted to love it but it didn't work on my long hair. I was disappointed by the price as it didn't detangle my hair either. Maybe best on short hair.

reviews.headline: Didn't like it
reviews.comments: I had high hopes for this product since my hair is similar to Jennifer Aniston's. As I get older, it gets thinner so I was looking for some volume, sprayed on roots before blow, drying my hair with the big round brush, but it instantly went flat and I didn't have a lot of volume even when I finished blow drying, very disappointed in the product and the cost.

reviews.headline: Not for my long hair.
reviews.comments: Didn't work on my long hair, but may be suitable for short hair.

reviews.headline: No volume
reviews.comments: This doesnt give volume at all. I spray at the roots because thats where I need volume but this does nothing. In fact I think my hair at the scalp gets greasier quicker when I use this. Usually i can go 3-4 days without washing but with this, my hair is limp & greasy by day 2. If I touch my hair too much, it definitely speeds up the grease with this.

reviews.headline: Yes Ii would
reviews.comments: Great product

reviews.headline: Excellent
reviews.comments: Great volume! Definitely recommend

reviews.headline: Volume
reviews.comments: Works just like it says. It provides volume but not in a major way, which is perfect for me. If your hair feels sticky, apply heat and the stickiness will go away.

reviews.headline: I love it!
reviews.comments: I just recommended this to my sister! It leaves my hair soft and doesn't weigh it down. My part looks much thinner.  I will definitely purchase again.

reviews.headline: It's a no!
reviews.comments: Made styling difficult because it tangled my thin hair. Plus did not add volume. I just threw it away

reviews.headline: Works as Advertised
reviews.comments: The product works as advertised. However, the scent is different than my LolaVie shampoo and conditioner. If the scent was the same, I would've kept it. It's too much scent for one hair wash.

reviews.headline: I would recommend this product
reviews.comments: My hair has been thinning so I need a little extra volume and this product is light, not sticky and feels good

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have pin straight, 1A hair. 
My strands are baby fine, but I have A LOT of it. (My hairdresser says a 1/4 section of my hair is average for most people). On top that, my hair is LONG (mid-lower back length), so it's super heavy. That means I have to make miracles happen to see any volume. I highlight regularly and my hair is prone to tangles (and breakage!) as well as fluff (the straight hair equivalent to frizz). I really have to watch what I use in my hair, as a good 90% of 'holy grail' hair products are a no-go for me. 

The spray comes in a nice looking bottle that's very clean and sleek looking, but also a bit basic at the same time. It has a pump top applicator that distributes out a super fine mist. The mist is awesome because it basically ensures you won't flood an area with too much product and it covers a wide area too. You don't need to use a ton of this, that's for sure. The pump doesn't get clogged either.

The formula is a yellowish colored, transparent liquid. On my thickness scale (1 being water and 10 being a rich body butter), I would rate this a 2. It's slightly thicker than water and has a much silkier texture with a bit of slip. It doesn't make my hair feel sticky, tacky or greasy AT ALL, but it does make it easier to comb through (even with all my tangles- this helps a lot!)

The smell is interesting. At first it's plesant and clean, but then the scent changes and smells a bit weird. I believe it's due to all the fermented ingredients. It's not gross or bad, just different. 

This definitely delivers volume! Im shocked that this alone can help as much as it does! My hair is soft and flexible (not crunchy) and there is NO residue at all. This helps keep my roots lifted and it smooths the fluff too. 

It also has helped strengthen my hair a lot too. It's not where near as brittle, so the fly aways are under control. 
This doesn't build up and washes out easy. 

I'm pretty impressed overall with this product and will definitely buy again!
faceoff_positive.headline: This definitely delivers on all it's claims!

faceoff_negative.comments: I got the plumping spray for free in exchange for writing the review. I wanted to love it as I use products like this daily to refresh my hair. I don't wash my daily and find products such as this helpful. To start, I didn't really love the smell of it. Also you need heat to activate the product so you can't just spray and go. Otherwise, it did an ok job but nothing better than other products out there. I have a few that don't even need a blow dryer. This is not something I would purchase. Although I see use for it for people who blow dry their hair more often than I do.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not an it product for me.
